### Hi there 👋

I'm a young computer enthusiast, who fell into this strange world very early on. A bit of a perfectionist on the edges, I like to discover the little hidden treasures of GitHub. I share my findings on [my blog](https://baptiste0928.net) and [my Twitter](https://twitter.com/baptiste0928) (only in French ![I <3 France](https://i.imgur.com/Ne8kl7P.png)).

#### 👨‍💻 My projects
I don't have many open-source projects yet, but **I'm working on the [RaidProtect](https://raidprotect.org) Discord bot**, which is used by tens of thousands of people! 🤗

#### 🥦 My skills
I mainly master the Python language, as well as JavaScript and web development (HTML/CSS). On the library side, I'm familiar with [discord.py](https://github.com/Rapptz/discord.py), [tailwindcss](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss) and [alpine.js](https://github.com/alpinejs/alpine). More recently, I started using Rust. 🦀

##### 📫 How to reach me : contact[at]baptiste0928.net
